author: kfogel
msg: * PORTING: Update with 0.9 feedback.  Remove any unused
"Notes" fields.  Change fieldname "Porters" to "Testers", as more
accurate.  Tweak intro.  Remove note about alphabetical order, it
wasn't working out due to there being N different ways to refer to the
same platform -- people should just search instead, I guess.
